actionTemplate.title: Two-Section Eyeshadow
steps: Apply a light shade over the full lid as a base
Layer a deeper shade from outer corner toward the center
Blend the seam with a transition shade
Deepen the outer corner and slightly elongate the eye

rationaleTemplate: Fast way to create depth with a simple light-to-deep structure.
Cleaner than darkening the whole lid, so it reads more polished.
